import { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Button from '../Button' import { AiOutlineArrowLeft } from 'react-icons/ai' import { useParams, Link } from 'react-router-dom' const Employee = () => { const [employee, setEmployee] = useState(null) const { id } = useParams() let table =[] console.log(id) const backButton =
Back
useEffect(() => { const fetchPatient = async () => { const res = await fetch('http://localhost:3000/api/HR/staff/dependents/' + id, { method: "GET" }) const data = await res.json() data.map((employee, index) => { setEmployee(employee) }) } if ( id !=='add'){ fetchPatient() } }, [id]); if (employee === null) { return (
) } return (
ID:
{employee.id_no}		 SIN:
{employee.sin}		 Gender:
{employee.gender}		 DOB:
{employee.dob.substring(0,10)}
Address:
{employee.address}		 Position:
{employee.job}		 Salary:
{employee.salary}

Dependents:

Martha Mom Mom
) } export default Employee
